title: Value added to U.S. GDP , by industry 2018
yAxis: Value added in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This chart shows the Value of added made by Industry in a GDP by .
\\n From the chart we see that the Government Industry was the Value added Industry in the by with 4239.3 added .
The next Industry to make the most added was the Manufacturing Industry with 2334.6 added closely followed by the Agriculture_forestry_fishing_and_hunting Industry with 164.2 added .

data.Industry: Finance insurance real estate rental and leasing
Educational services health care and social assistance
Arts entertainment recreation accommodation and food services

gold: In 2018 , the finance , real estate , insurance , rental , and leasing industry added the most value to the GDP to the United States in 2018 . In that year , this industry added 4.23 trillion U.S. dollars to the national GDP . Gross Domestic Product Gross domestic product is a measure of how much a country produces in a certain amount of time .
